# NVRAM file for USI WM-BAN-BM-16
manfid=0x2d0
prodid=0x0653
vendid=0x14e4
devid=0x4386
boardtype=0x0653
boardrev=0x1203
boardnum=22
macaddr=00:90:4c:c5:12:38
sromrev=3
#boardflags: 
# bit 19 3tswitch:   2.4GHz FEM: SP3T switch share with BT
# bit 16	 nopa:   no external pa
#            keep original 0x200
boardflags=0x0090201
xtalfreq=37400
nocrc=1
ag0=255
aa2g=1
ccode=ALL
pa0itssit=0x20
#PA parameters for 2.4GHz
pa0b0=0x1DD1
pa0b1=0xFC91
pa0b2=0xFF79
tssifloor2g=60
# rssi params for 2.4GHz
rssismf2g=0xf
rssismc2g=0x8
rssisav2g=0x1
cckPwrOffset=0
# rssi params for 5GHz
rssismf5g=0xf
rssismc5g=0x7
#rssisav5g=0x1
rssisav5g=0x3
#PA parameters for lower a-band
pa1lob0=0x1464
pa1lob1=0xFD80
pa1lob2=0xFF54
tssifloor5gl=50
#PA parameters for midband
pa1b0=0x164D
pa1b1=0xFD55
pa1b2=0xFF50
tssifloor5gm=40
#PA paramasdeters for high band
pa1hib0=0x14FA
pa1hib1=0xFD79
pa1hib2=0xFF5F
tssifloor5gh=45
rxpo5g=0

maxp2ga0=0x48
# 18dBm max; 16.5dBm target
#Per rate power back-offs for g band, in .5 dB steps. Set it once you have the right numbers.
cck2gpo=0x3333
#11b 15dBm
ofdm2gpo=0x55555555
#11g 14dBm
mcs2gpo0=0x7777
# M3-M0 13dBm
mcs2gpo1=0x7777
# M7-M4 13dBm
mcs2gpo2=0x9999
# HT40 M3-M0 12dBm
mcs2gpo4=0x9999
# HT40 M7-M4 12dBm

#max power for 5G
maxp5ga0=0x42
maxp5gla0=0x44
maxp5gha0=0x3E
# 17.5dBm max; 16dBm target
#Per rate power back-offs for a band, in .5 dB steps. Set it once you have the right numbers.
ofdm5gpo=0x44444444
ofdm5glpo=0x44444444
ofdm5ghpo=0x44444444
#11a 14dBm
mcs5gpo0=0x6666
mcs5glpo0=0x6666
mcs5ghpo0=0x6666
# M3-M0 13dBm
mcs5gpo1=0x6666
mcs5glpo1=0x6666
mcs5ghpo1=0x6666
# M7-M4 13dBm
mcs5gpo2=0x8888
mcs5glpo2=0x8888
mcs5ghpo2=0x8888
# HT40 M3-M0 12dBm
mcs5gpo3=0x8888
mcs5glpo3=0x8888
mcs5ghpo3=0x8888
# HT40 M7-M4 12dBm

# Parameters for DAC2x mode and ALPF bypass
# RF SW Truth Table: ctrl0 for BT_TX; ctrl1 or 5G Tx; ctrl2 for 5G Rx; Ctrl3 for 2G Tx; Ctrl4 for 2G Rx
swctrlmap_2g=0x00080008,0x00100010,0x00080008,0x011010,0x11f
swctrlmap_5g=0x00020002,0x00040004,0x00020002,0x011010,0x2fe
gain=32
triso2g=8
triso5g=8
#tx parameters
loflag=0
iqlocalidx5g=40
dlocalidx5g=70
iqcalidx5g=50
lpbckmode5g=1 
txiqlopapu5g=0
txiqlopapu2g=0
dlorange_lowlimit=5
txalpfbyp=1
txalpfpu=1
dacrate2xen=1
papden2g=1
papden5g=1
#rx parameters
gain_settle_dly_2g=4
gain_settle_dly_5g=4
noise_cal_po_2g=-1
noise_cal_po_40_2g=-1
noise_cal_high_gain_2g=73
noise_cal_nf_substract_val_2g=346
noise_cal_po_5g=-1
noise_cal_po_40_5g=-1
noise_cal_high_gain_5g=73
noise_cal_nf_substract_val_5g=346
cckpapden=0
edonthd20l=-70
edoffthd20ul=-76

#aci_detect_en_2g=1

# Enable WoW and OOB interrupt: level trigger
muxenab=0x10

#2013/02/18 initial for USI module
#2013/02/22 Calibrate TX power & update user-mode target power 
#2013/02/28 change cckPwrOffset=3, cckpapden=1 from BRCM new release nvram
#2013/03/07 Calibrate TX power using 2nd sample 
#2013/03/20 Change cckpapden=0, Calibrate TX using conformal shielding sample
#2013/04/15 Change cckPwrOffset=0, and update user mode max power parameter
